title: ncurses fails to build on Cray Cori at NERSC
body:
Problem:  On NERSC CRAY Cori using PrgEnv-gnu with no special packages.yaml or modules involved.
When trying to do this install:  **spack install cbtf-krell +runtime os=CNL**

**I get this failure:**
```
==> Installing ncurses
==> Error: SyntaxError: invalid syntax (<string>, line 425)
SyntaxError: SyntaxError: invalid syntax (<string>, line 425)
/global/u2/j/jgalaro/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py:684, in child_process:
     27    
     28                # build up some context from the offending package so we can
     29                # show that, too.
  >> 30                package_context = get_package_context(tb)
     31    
     32                build_log = None
     33                if hasattr(pkg, 'log_path'):

I have patches to cbtf-krell, but they don't effect this issue.

**This is the full output:**
```
